attributes.additional_details:
Each prisoner costs a substantial amount of money to keep in prison and our prisons are clogging up.

Offenders who are sentenced to more than 7 years in prison should be deported back to their home country. Seven years allows so that not all offenders are simply kicked out of the country and that only serious offenders are kicked out.

This would probably save the country millions each year and keep serious offenders out of our country.
